>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.YHaMYdptLi3fXfVH]{Bombard}

As a full action, you can make a ranged attack that knocks enemies back. Targets you hit are knocked back 5 feet from you. If you use a weapon with the explode special property, all targets that fail their saving throws are instead knocked back 5 feet from the center of the explosion. An enemy that you critically hit or that rolls a natural 1 on its saving throw is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone}. You canâ€™t make an impactful attack with an automatic weapon, but you can use this ability with a weapon that has the blast special property.
